dcterms:creator: Jakub Kowalski
Radoslaw Miernik
dcterms:description: Legends of Code and Magic (LOCM) is a two-player collectible card game created to promote AI research. It consists of a draft stage and a battle stage, with deterministic card effects and a large number of possible decks.
dcterms:title: Legends of Code and Magic (LOCM)

dcterms:creator: Ronaldo e Silva Vieira
Anderson Rocha Tavares
Luiz Chaimowicz
dcterms:description: OpenAI Gym Environments for Legends of Code and Magic provides a framework for training and evaluating agents in the LOCM game environment.
dcterms:title: OpenAI Gym Environments for Legends of Code and Magic

dcterms:creator: Alexander Dockhorn
Sanaz Mostaghim
dcterms:description: The Hearthstone AI Competition focused on developing AI agents for the game Hearthstone, featuring various tracks for different gameplay styles.
dcterms:title: Hearthstone AI Competition
